job_tasks.phrase: Samen bouwen we aan de nieuwe generatie onderzoeksmogelijkheden voor advocaten en fiscalisten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building a new generation of research capabilities, which is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: De komende tijd zal jij werken aan het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken, een case-builder helpen op te zetten en continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details specific software development tasks: enabling the use of internal documents (integration), setting up a case-builder (development), and continuous improvements to the codebase (maintenance/development).

job_tasks.phrase: Dat wil zeggen dat je, wanneer gewenst, zelf aan de slag kan gaan met experimenten om het product te verbeteren met machine learning modellen (zowel open-source als GPT).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working with experiments to improve the product using machine learning models, which falls under model development and experimentation.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI is de juridische sector snel aan het veranderen. Deze technologie biedt veel mogelijkheden om het werk van juristen en fiscalisten efficiÃ«nter en leuker te maken.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase demonstrates an understanding of the business context and how AI can impact the legal sector, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Maar hoe doe je dit op een betrouwbare manier?
job_tasks.justification: This question implies a need to understand the business problem of reliability in AI solutions for the legal sector.

job_tasks.phrase: Het afgelopen jaar heeft het AI team van Sdu GenIA-L gelanceerd. Dit is het eerste AI product in Nederland dat juridische en fiscale vraagstukken betrouwbaar kan beantwoorden. Het wordt dan ook dagelijks veelvuldig gebruikt.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business context and the product's value proposition, indicating an understanding of the business domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Twee grote doelen om GenIA-L naar een hoger niveau te tillen zijn om het systeem beter te integreren in het dagelijkse werkproces van de gebruiker en de kwaliteit van het systeem te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights strategic goals for product improvement, focusing on user integration and quality, which relates to understanding business needs and product strategy.

soft_skills.justification: Expresses an interest in AI, implying a willingness to learn and adapt to this evolving field.

soft_skills.phrase: Daarnaast krijg je de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states an opportunity to increase AI knowledge, indicating a focus on learning and development.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes traditional back-end development tasks such as improving codebase, integrating internal documents, and setting up a case-builder. While there is an interest in AI and an opportunity to experiment with ML models (including GPT), the core responsibilities are rooted in software engineering. The role aims to integrate AI into existing systems and improve them, rather than focusing solely on AI model development or specialization. The tasks are predominantly from Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration) with some exposure to Macro-Category B (Model Development & Fine-Tuning), fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core back-end development responsibilities and mentions AI as an area of interest and development. The distinction between core software engineering and AI experimentation is present, allowing for a confident classification. However, the depth of AI involvement is not as extensive as in a 'Core GenAI Engineer' role, hence not a perfect score.
